sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM RELATION WHERE RELATION_FOLLOWER = #relationFollower# AND RELATION_FOLLOWING = #relationFollowing#
sqlMap.select: SELECT D.MEMBER_NAME, D.MEMBER_PIC_PATH, D.MEMBER_PIC_SAVE_NAME, D.MEMBER_CODE FROM (SELECT A.RELATION_FOLLOWING FROM RELATION A, MEMBER B WHERE B.MEMBER_CODE = #relationFollower# AND A.RELATION_FOLLOWER = B.MEMBER_CODE) C, MEMBER D WHERE C.RELATION_FOLLOWING=D.MEMBER_CODE
